body: When an enemy makes a melee attack roll against the magus, as an immediate action the magus can end the athame's duration to gain a deflection bonus to his Armor Class until the end of his next turn. This bonus is equal to the level of the spell sacrificed to create the athame (maximum +5).
name: Spellblade Parry
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Magus/Magus Archetypes/Spellblade/Spellblade Arcana/Spellblade Parry
